name: ColorJam
description:
In ColorJam, you wake up in a colorless city. You are then tasked to collect 3 color gems across the world and restore the colors back to Jam city!

Featuring:

  • Jorginho, a green axolotl wearing a fitness outfit (you're controlling him)
  • A very SUSpicious doctor
  • Chickens, OH GOD THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!
  • The popular republic of bananas
  • Amazing and well crafted puzzles for the smarts (real hard, careful guys :c )
  • A very angry bear
  • Bob.
  • Masterfully crafted soundtrack
  • A mindblowing finale!
  • Ritz (yes we convinced the guy)

This game was made for the gamejam https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-111-colors , with a team of 4 newbies in game development and a tight deadline of 72 hours.

It is the first videogame we ever made, please enjoy it!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

(And if you think the game is GARBISH, and CHILDISH, THEN that's ok  thanks for coming by. GOODBAYYYYYYYY)
